document.full_text: jason varitek, like jorge posada a 39-year-old switch-hitter and longtime catcher who is struggling at bat, said that adjusting to a diminished defensive role was not easy.
document.title: varitek understands posada's distress
lines_and_colors: jason varitek, like jorge posada a 39-year-old switch-hitter and longtime catcher who is struggling at bat, said that adjusting to a diminished defensive role was not easy.
